activity.text: Use ShadCN Select for Language Selector in User Profile Page

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12736
activity.text:
@AdityaJ2305 @rithviknishad  I would like to work on this issue

**Proposed Solution**:

- Replaced the native <select> element with the ShadCN <Select> component in the Language Selector component.
- I’ll refer to other implementations in the codebase that use ShadCN Select to ensure consistency in styling and usage.

ETA: 2 days after assignment

If this is acceptable, could you please assign me this issue ?

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12703
activity.text:
@Tanuj1718 I am interested in working on this issue **Propsed Solution**: - Adding
tags to display start date,start time,end date and end time in seperate lines (or N/A if no end date and time is specified - Align left to make the contents left aligned same as Consent given on These changes would change UI as ![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/9ed1e222-360b-413a-920b-49ea30046ace) End date : 25 June 2025 If this is acceptable ,could you please assign me this issue ?

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12693
activity.text:
@nihal467  I'm interested in working on this issue 
The current issue  is due to the difference in the seconds and milliseconds part of the start time and prescribed time 

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/945424e0-c0f0-4a4b-8b7c-7b89831bc03a)

**Proposed Solution**:
Truncating both the start time and prescribed time to minute level would be a possible fix for this issue.

ETA: June 25 ,2025

If this solution is acceptable,could you please assign this issue to me ?
